Name: For The Warp
About the game: For the Warp is a roguelike deck-building game in space! Discover and add new cards to your arsenal and increase your chances of surviving. Explore procedurally generated systems and fight your way to the warp gate Encounter allies and foes, ancient civilization ruins, unlock powerful technologies and ships. History: You assembled a ragtag team for a dangerous trade route, but suddenly the nearest warp gate was destroyed. You have no option but to take the longest route and deliver your valuable cargo to make a hefty profit... Just survive and reach for the warp gate! Features 6 ships, 120 play cards, 34 equipment cards Explore procedurally generated systems and fight your way to the warp gate Encounter allies and foes, ancient civilization ruins, unlock powerful technologies and ships Discover and add new cards to your arsenal and increase your chances of surviving. Pixelart by Kirokaze Synth-pop music made by Martyn Stonehouse
